metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16981 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: stb stb_image.h 2.19, as used in catimg, Emscripten, and other products, has a heap-based buffer overflow in the stbi__out_gif_code function.

criterions.comment: catimg package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
ccextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
goxel package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libsfml package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
